questions.quote: My parents. It's their anniversary. I'm taking them out to dinner and a show tonight. You think we'll hit traffic?
Oh, it's a cake party. It's the third one today. I didn't realize how hooked I got on that 4:00 sugar rush.
So it was a good party, huh? Oh... you're welcome, you're welcome...  They loved the TV, *loved* it!
Because, it's part of our relationship, it's an indication of trust. We're not supposed to keep secrets from one another.
Okay, well, he had this idea of a pizza place where you make your own pie!
Come on.. Come on. Yes!  There's one!  I wish I don't drop dead!!
Well, we don't have any in stock right now but I would be happy to order it for you. Just give me your phone number and when it comes in I'll give you a call. You're name is?
Well, it's these people-- they go swimmin' in the winter. They're terrific, I just took my first swim today. Brrrrrrr! It's invigorating....
Yeah, I know, but I can't drive anybody anywhere until I go down to the motor vehicle bureau and get my new plates.
Well, that woman had it coming to her. Look at my neck, it looks like I had a beard of bees!
